articles.title: Article How Much Does Wearing a Mask Protect You? - WebMD
articles.description: Yes, you should still wear a mask, despite the findings of a new study out of Denmark that tested whether paper surgical face masks protect the people who wear them.
articles.content:
There are plenty of reasons not to abandon masks based on this one study.
